v8:item.v8:content: Duplicates found context menu group edit
Duplicates found context menu group edit form
The arrow marks the original items that will not be deleted.
The replacement of duplicates might have generated duplicates in other lists
For example, when replacing counterparty duplicates, duplicates of contracts or bank accounts can appear.
To continue searching, select a list and click "New search."
Important items are replaced items with a high chance for new duplicates.
Pending duplicates context menu group open
Select an item to view all of its unsuccessful replacements.
Open the report to view all the duplicates.
The original item will replace duplicates.
